HColorValue

ColorValues are HValue extensions used to support the special type of value with special xml output and internal representanion as a fixed size array.  It has the accompanying methods to set part-colors.

Summary
HColorValue
ColorValues are HValue extensions used to support the special type of value with special xml output and internal representanion as a fixed size array.
constructor
We just need the id and value, as usual.
validate
Simple value validation
set
You should only set with values as arrays with three integers in range 0..255.
getRed
The Red color part as an integer number.
getGreen
The Green color part as an integer number.
getBlue
The Blue color part as an integer number.
setRed
setGreen
setBlue
toXML
Generates an XML description of the color.

constructor

constructor: function(_id,
_value)

We just need the id and value, as usual.  However the value has to be a array with excactly three items.

Parameters

_idSee HValue.constructor
_valueA valid three-part color array, see validate

validate

validate: function(_value)

Simple value validation

Parameters

_valueMust be Array with excactly three numbers: [R,G,B].  Nothing else is supported.

set

set: function(_value)

You should only set with values as arrays with three integers in range 0..255.

getRed

getRed: function()

Returns

The Red color part as an integer number.

getGreen

getGreen: function()

Returns

The Green color part as an integer number.

getBlue

getBlue: function()

Returns

The Blue color part as an integer number.

setRed

setRed: function(_redVal)

Parameters

_redValSet Red color part as an valid (0...255) integer number.

setGreen

setGreen: function(_grnVal)

Parameters

_grnValSet Green color part as an valid (0...255) integer number.

setBlue

setBlue: function(_bluVal)

Parameters

_bluValSet Blue color part as an valid (0...255) integer number.

toXML

toXML: function(_i)

Generates an XML description of the color.

Parameter

_iThe sequence number of the item, generated by HValueManager.

Returns

An XML string with the 3 RGB colorparts

See Also

HValue.toXML HValueManager.toXML

Sample

<color id="996" order="30" hexvalue="#ffcc33"><red>255</red><green>204</green><blue>51</blue></color>'
Generated by Natural Docs
Data that needs to be syncronized between components or remote clients should be implemented as HValues.

_value)
We just need the id and value, as usual.

constructor: function(_id,
_value)
toXML: function(_i)
Responsible for generating the xml representation of the value object.
toXML: function()
Outputs all changed values to XML.
